description: Extract a specific property value from an object by key name.

inputs.name: object
inputs.description: The object to extract the property from

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: The name of the property to extract

outputs.name: value
outputs.description: The value of the specified property

outputs.name: exists
outputs.description: Whether the property exists in the object

settings.name: default_value
settings.description: Value to return if the property doesn't exist
